title: 108_s1814
content: Transfers administrative jurisdiction of certain Federal lands in Stoddard County, Missouri, from the Secretary of the Interior to the Secretary of Agriculture for continued operation of the Mingo Job Corps Civilian Conservation Center. Maintains Department of Labor agreements with respect to such Center. Transfers eligible employees, with their benefits and without a break in Federal service and without competition, from the Department of the Interior, US Fish and Wildlife Service, to the Department of Agriculture. Authorizes appropriations.
